short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's like having Tom in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Translates words on the web pages you visit to phrases that Tom Haverford (Aziz Ansari) uses on the show Parks and Recreation.

Includes:
Fork - Food Rake
Tortilla - Bean Blankie
Root Beer - Super Water
Egg - Pre Bird
Chicken Cacciatore - Chicky Catch
Fried Chicken - Fri Fri Chicky Chick
Chicken Parm - Chicky Chicky Parm Parm
Noodle - Long Ass Rice
Cake - Big Ol' Cookie
Air Conditioner - Cool Blasterz
Sandwiches - Sammies
Entree - Tray Tray
Dessert - Ssert
Raisin - Old Ass Grapes
Lemonade - LL Cool Ade
Soft Serve - Vanilla Ice
Nutella - Bust A Nut
Lasagna - Lazy Gaga
40s - Malt Whitmans
Milk - Cereal Sauce
Pork Chops - Oink Steak
Guacamole - Guaca Guaca Flame
Beer - Punky Brewster
Frozen Yogurt - Fro Yo Ma
Tea - Tea Pain
Celery - Celery Swank
Dumplings - Lil' Surprises
Apple - Teacher Candy
Cocktail Wiener - Lil' Bow Wow
Water - Hot Ice
Gum - Chew Chew Train
Boxers - Muhammad Alis
Pork Rinds - Busta Rinds
Ice Cream - Milk on the Rocks
Pork - Notorious P.I.G.

Source located here: https://github.com/climberpete/TomTranslator

Suggestions, comments or bugs - climberpete@gmail.com
